SourceProxy.name: MaximizeSquaredGaussianCurvatureProjectionFilter
SourceProxy.label: Maximize Squared Gaussian Curvature Projection Filter

Documentation.short_help: Filter that computes a projected surface from a high-dimensional dataset such that the squared Gaussian curvature is maximized.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectInputScalars
StringVectorProperty.label: Point Scalars to Use for Percentile
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set point scalar field to use to calculate the percentile. The points will be sorted according to this scalar field in ascending order and the last percentile of points will be retained.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Percentile
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the desired percentile of points.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaximumEdgeLength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum size of a tetrahedra edge in the output dataset.

StringVectorProperty.label: Point Arrays to Evaluate
StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayStatus
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property lists which point arrays to use when finding the projection that maximizes the squared Gaussian curvature. You must have at least three point arrays selected to create a 3D projection.
